citations.narrative:
This facility's annual contingency plan review has not been documented since 2023. Each licensee must maintain
documentation of their annual contingency plan reviews, including documenting any amendments or changes made since
the previous year's review. Failure to maintain documentation of contingency plan reviews prevents APHIS officials from
verifying that the plan has been reviewed annually. The facility must ensure that documentation of the contingency plan
annual review is maintained and made available to APHIS upon request. Correct by March 5, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
This facility's annual contingency plan review has not been documented since 2023. Each licensee must maintain 
documentation of their annual contingency plan reviews, including documenting any amendments or changes made since 
the previous year's review. Failure to maintain documentation of contingency plan reviews prevents APHIS officials from 
verifying that the plan has been reviewed annually. The facility must ensure that documentation of the contingency plan 
annual review is maintained and made available to APHIS upon request. Correct by March 5, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
